synopsis.text: Accompanied by his peculiar, long-legged pig, Tortov Roddle, a silent wanderer, embarks on a surreal and dreamlike journey through a mysterious, soundless world. As he traverses the desert from one peculiar town to another, Tortov encounters the extraordinary inhabitants and their bizarre customs, while reflecting on his own enigmatic past. The captivating illustrations and 2D computer animation bring to life a mesmerizing blend of nightmares and dreams, as Tortov's adventures unfold in a series of short films that showcase the fascinating landscapes and intriguing characters he meets along the way. Prepare to be whisked away on an otherworldly voyage through the eyes of Tortov Roddle, a traveler who finds beauty and wonder in the most unexpected places.
